articles.description: A wildlife trust says brewery's planned solar farm is in the wrong place and calls for a moratorium.
articles.content:
A brewery's solar farm plans on "Wales' Amazon rainforest" have met opposition.
Wildlife campaigners want a temporary ban - or moratorium - on solar farms on the Gwent Levels due to concerns about t… [+4275 chars]
